name: SpaceMan Experimentation
description:
My 3D Platformer project for the Game Design and Development Course on Coursera.

Assets provided by MSU.

Modifications

  • Created a complete, interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Added Two additional levels while tying them in to create a logical progression in the game.
  • Added voiceovers using Balabolka (Text-to-speech recorder) to give the game a bit of narrative. 
  • Added ending screen to give the player some finality and accomplishment.
